id: Track your side projects in Notion

description: A Notion template to help you organize and plan all your side projects.FeaturesWeekly planning : to manage the tasks from your different sides.Progress of all your projects : number of tasks, progress bar (automatic calculation), task linked to the corresponding project.To-do list : track your tasksEverything you need to manage your side business can be found in this Notion template.FAQsDoes this work on the free version of Notion?Yes.
